What services do you offer?: We provide outpatient consultations, laboratory testing, pharmacy services, and emergency care at our medical centres.
Where are you located?: We are located in Nairobi with multiple centers across surrounding counties. Check our website for addresses and hours.
How do I book an appointment?: You can book online via our website, through the mobile app, or call our hotline at +254-700-123-456.
Do you accept insurance?: Yes — we accept many major insurance providers. Please contact us with your insurer name and policy number to confirm coverage.
What are your opening hours?: Most clinics are open Mon–Sat 8:00–18:00. Emergency care is 24/7 at designated locations.
